007package violajones_demos;
008
009import ij.IJ;
010import ij.ImagePlus;
011import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
012import ij.io.LogStream;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
016import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
017import imagingbook.core.plugin.JavaDocHelp;
018import imagingbook.violajones.data.HaarTrainingSet;
019import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FaceDetector;
020import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FaceDetector.Parameters;
021import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FaceRegion;
022import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
023
024import java.awt.Color;
025import java.util.List;
026
027
028/**
029 * ImageJ plugin. Face detection ImageJ plugin using 'imagingbook.violajones' implementation of the Viola-Jones face
030 * detection algorithm: Paul Viola and Michael Jones, "Robust Real-time Face Detection", International Journal of
031 * Computer Vision 57.2 (2004), pp. 137â€“154.
032 *
033 * @author W. Burger
034 * @version 2018/12/09
035 */
036public class Find_Faces implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
037        
038        static {
039                LogStream.redirectSystem();
040                PrintPrecision.set(6);
041        }
042        
043        static boolean extractFaceImages = false;
044        static HaarTrainingSet trainingSet = HaarTrainingSet.FrontalFaceAlt2;
045        
046        ImagePlus im = null;
047
048        @Override
049        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
050                this.im = im;
051                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
052        }
053        
054        @Override
055        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
056                
057                Parameters params = new Parameters();
058                
059//              params.baseScale = 1.5;
060//              params.scaleStep = 1.05;
061//              params.winShiftFraction = 0.1;
062//              params.minNeighbors = 1;
063//              params.minMergeRegionOverlap = 0.2;
064//              
065//              params.doGradientPruning = false;
066//              params.gradientSigma = 1.0;
067//              params.minGradientMagnitude = 5;
068//              params.maxGradientMagnitude = 100;
069                
070                if (!runDialog(params)) return;
071                
072                IjUtils.setRgbConversionWeights(ip);
073//              FaceDetector detector = FaceDetector.create(trainingSet.getStream(), params);
074                HaarCascadeDescriptor descriptor = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(trainingSet.getStream());
075                FaceDetector detector = new FaceDetector(descriptor, params);
076                List<FaceRegion> faces = detector.findFaces(ip.convertToByteProcessor());
077                IJ.log(faces.size() + " faces found!");
078                
079                // show results
080                ImageProcessor cp = ip.convertToColorProcessor();
081                for (FaceRegion r : faces) {
082                        draw(r, cp);
083                }
084                new ImagePlus(this.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": results", cp).show();
085                
086                if (extractFaceImages && !faces.isEmpty()) {
087                        int faceCtr = 0;
088                        for (FaceRegion r : faces) {
089                                ip.setRoi(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height);
090                                new ImagePlus("Face " + faceCtr, ip.crop()).show();
091                                faceCtr++;
092                        }
093                }
094        }
095        
096        private boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
097                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Set Face Detector Parameters");
098                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
099                gd.addChoice("Haar training set", getEnumNames(HaarTrainingSet.class), trainingSet.name());
100                gd.addNumericField("baseScale", params.baseScale, 2);
101                gd.addNumericField("scaleStep", params.scaleStep, 2);
102                gd.addNumericField("winShiftFraction", params.winShiftFraction, 2);
103                gd.addNumericField("minNeighbors", params.minNeighbors, 0);
104                gd.addNumericField("minMergeRegionOverlap", params.minMergeRegionOverlap, 2);
105                
106                gd.addCheckbox("doGradientPruning", params.doGradientPruning);
107                
108                gd.addNumericField("gradientSigma", params.gradientSigma, 2);
109                gd.addNumericField("minGradientMagnitude", params.minGradientMagnitude, 0);
110                gd.addNumericField("maxGradientMagnitude", params.maxGradientMagnitude, 2);
111                
112                gd.addCheckbox("extractFaceImages", extractFaceImages);
113                
114                gd.showDialog();
115                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
116                        return false;
117                }
118                
119                trainingSet = HaarTrainingSet.valueOf(gd.getNextChoice());
120                params.baseScale = gd.getNextNumber();
121                params.scaleStep = gd.getNextNumber();
122                params.winShiftFraction = gd.getNextNumber();
123                params.minNeighbors = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
124                params.minMergeRegionOverlap = gd.getNextNumber();
125                
126                params.doGradientPruning = gd.getNextBoolean();
127                
128                params.gradientSigma = gd.getNextNumber();
129                params.minGradientMagnitude = gd.getNextNumber();
130                params.maxGradientMagnitude = gd.getNextNumber();
131                
132                extractFaceImages = gd.getNextBoolean();
133                return true;
134        }
135
136        private void draw(FaceRegion f, ImageProcessor cp) {
137                cp.setColor(Color.green);
138                cp.drawRect(f.x, f.y, f.width, f.height);
139        }
140        
141        private static <E extends Enum<E>> String[] getEnumNames(Class<E> enumclass) {
142                E[] eConstants = enumclass.getEnumConstants();
143                String[] eNames = new String[eConstants.length];
144                for (int i = 0; i < eConstants.length; i++) {
145                        eNames[i] = eConstants[i].name();
146                }
147                return eNames;
148        }
149
150}
